title: Item sets
body: I noticed that in the new client that there is no item sets. Is it supposed to not be there or they forgot to put a tab on the new client?

replies.body:
Item sets are still in the game but you cannot create new ones or edit old ones. You can still use the editor in the legacy client for now.

https://youtu.be/5F_BuZb-lYI

Indeed, the updated client doesn't have that feature currently.  I don't have any news on when that would make an appearance, but feel free to share any concerns on the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  In the meantime feel free to help test out other features.  Thanks!
